# App Concept

**Date**: 4 de fevereiro de 2026

## Application Purpose
A vehicle and machine maintenance tracking application for personal use.

## Core Concept
An app to store and manage all personal vehicles and machines (motorcycles, cars, generators, etc.) with maintenance tracking capabilities.

## Key Principles

### Data Storage
- **NO cloud connection**
- **100% local storage** on the phone
- All data persists on the device

### Target Users
- Personal use
- Individual owners of multiple vehicles/machines
- Users who want offline-first maintenance tracking

## Machine Types Supported
- Vehicles (cars, motorcycles, etc.)
- Generators
- Other machines with maintenance requirements
